name: End of Knights
description:
The undead have risen and seek to destroy your only remaining safe haven.
You play as the final Knight, the only surviving warrior willing to battle the hoards of undead warriors and defend his home.

Gameplay

End of Knights is an intense hack and slash survival game accompanied by an original Rock/Metal soundtrack. In this solo-developed game, You will experience challenging and intense gameplay focused on player mastery.

Enemies will attempt to destroy the walls that protect your stronghold. If they reach and destroy your stronghold or defeat you in battle... it's game over.

You will unlock and upgrade skills by completing challenges, these skills are kept between every new attempt you make to save your stronghold.

Collect Magic from defeated enemies and use it to slam protective Runes into the ground, fire powerful projectiles to decimate your enemies and cleave a path through the hoards with a lightning fast dash.

Features

  • Intense arcade action.
  • 22 increasingly challenging waves to survive.
  • 6 unique enemy types.
  • 4 powerful skills to unlock, upgrade and master.
  • 19 challenges to complete.
  • A melodic Rock / Metal soundtrack.
